title: My client is super laggy and its the same way too in game
body: I tried clearing space, using anti virus and stuffs and its still the same. This happened in my ranked game and I had to play Blitz with a weird kind lag akin to having 200ping but I actually have around 20-30ping in game

replies.body: Hm, this is happening to me alot aswell. It's been going on since a few days ago. It shows my latency in game is 40-70 but at times the game will freeze up  then resume. Other times when I press a button or mouse click it wont register. Also, in the game client everything is delayed by a few seconds. It's been only happening when I play League, other games I don't experience any lag/delay.

Hmmmmm that weird lag thing kind of sounds like you might have been experiencing packet loss. Essentially that means that some of the data coming from your network gets lost before it hits our servers. As you can imagine, that can cause some pretty funky things to happen with your connection, so let's test for any packet loss really quickly using your latest network logs and this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot and post it here so I can see!
